item.title: Mathematics Notes
item.description: Functional Analysis Banach-Hahn Theorem Open Mapping Theorem Closed Graph Theorem Banach-Alaoglu Theorem Arzelà–Ascoli Theorem Morse Theory Morse Theory Let \(f\) be a smooth real valued function on manifold M. Let \(a < b\) and suppose that the set \(f^{-1}[a,b]\) is compact and contain no critical points of \(f\). Then \(M^{a}\) is differomorphic to \(M^{b}\). Futhermore, \(M^{a}\) is a
